name: Event Photography Services
description: I capture the spirit of your event and offer engaging directions to get the perfect event photos. My events services offered you Event Videography, Drone Photography, Walk-around Photography & also 5 varieties of Photo Booths.

name: Product Photography Services
description: Ship your product to me and get a photo pack of 10 shots from different angles or an interactive 360-degree image. Use your free Square account to download and manage your images. Photos are ready within 5 days.

name: Teaching Photography Services
description: I've been teaching for 2 years - and A level photography specifically for 12 of those. I teach classes of about 32 students, in 14 hours a week. I don't teach Photoshop at all (though of course my students are freely permitted to use it). I teach my students these seven basic elements of photographic art: line, shape, form, texture, color, size, and depth. As a photographic artist, your knowledge and awareness of these different elements can be vital to the success of your composition and help convey the meaning of your photograph.
